title: Luxurious studio & 1 & 2 bedroom apartments on the coast of Northern Cyprus
description:
Luxurious 1 & 2 bedroom apartments on the coast of Northern Cyprus

Property within walking distance from the beach in Northern Cyprus. This project is located in the Esentepe region, offering direct views of the sea and the mountains of Northern Cyprus. The project is divided into two phases:

• The 1st Phase of the project consists of villas located on the beach

• The 2nd phase of the project consists of 14 blocks of studio apartments and 4 Blocks of apartments 1+1 and 2+1, communal swimming pools and decorative step pools

The luxury studio apartments are located on a total area of 47m2, the internal area has 35m2 and a terrace of 12m2.
The complex has a large communal swimming pool with an artificial beach consisting of real sand, a restaurant in the pool, a spa center, a gym, and a tennis court. Also on the territory of the complex, you will find a lot of entertainment for both adults and children. This project will allow you not only to enjoy life on the beach but also to make a profit from renting on the coast of Northern Cyprus. A unique project with a flexible payment plan, interest-free installments for 4 years on the first coastline of Northern Cyprus. The project is created for those who want to enjoy a luxurious life on the Mediterranean coast.

  • City : 3 km
  • Airport : 45 km / 75 km
  • Beach : 500 m

Why need to invest in this property in North Cyprus Kyrenia;

• Interest-free installment payment plan for 4 years
• Unique project architecture
• The first coastline
• Good rental income

Features & Amenities;

• Private beach
• Turkish bath
• Spa center

title: Seafront magnificent project with hotel concept in Long Beach, Iskele in North Cyprus
description:
Seafront magnificent project with hotel concept in Long Beach, Iskele in North Cyprus

Located 400 meters from the sea in Long Beach area, it is an apartment-style residential complex with beautiful landscapes and breathtaking views over the Mediterranean Sea, which can offer you a luxurious and 365-days holiday-style life. Complex has the facilities and infrastructure as a 5-star hotel and is perfectly suitable both for holiday home in Northern Cyprus and staying all year round. The project has outstanding living spaces and social facilities, on the residence’s territory you can find almost all needed amenities, such as couple of restaurants with different cuisines, pools, market, tennis court, open cinema, beauty center, gym, infinity pool on the 10th floor, 24/7 management service and much more. Two 5-star hotel projects located directly opposite, where also will be the biggest casino on the island and uninterrupted sea views. This project is a good example of investment properties in North Cyprus as the rental and development prospect of the region transform this residence into an investment that continuously gains value.

The residence consists of a total of four blocks, one block of which will serve as a hotel. It includes 686 units which is a combination of studios, 1+1, 2+1, 3+1 apartments and 4+1 and 5+1 luxury penthouses. All the apartments in the blocks are oriented to a 180-degree sea view. In addition, all penthouses will have their private swimming pool on the roof terrace.
Starting price for this project is 99.000 GBP.

  • Studio apartments with a living area of 33-40 m2 and a balcony area of 7-12 m2
  • 1+1 apartments with a living area of 60-75 m2 and a balcony area of 7-36 m2
  • 2+1 apartments with a living area of 93-125 m2 and a balcony area of 8,5-50 m2
  • 3+1 apartments with a living area of 125 m2 and a balcony area of 15,5-19 m2
  • 5+1 penthouse apartments with a living area of 219 m2, a balcony area of 98 m2 and a private roof terrace area of 94 m2

 

COMPLETION DATE: A Block delivery date is May 2025, B Block delivery date is August 2025, C and D Block delivery date is May 2026.

title: Exclusive beachfront villas and apartments for sale in North Cyprus
description:
Exclusive beachfront villas and apartments for sale in North Cyprus

Property within walking distance to the beach in North Cyprus. The new spectacular project is located in Esentepe area, the most popular village on the island with breathtaking sea and mountain views, which is surrounded by numerous amenities making this area a rising star for property investment in North Cyprus. The beach is within a few steps of reach. Also, in just 15 minutes drive you can find the 18-hole championship golf course at the 5* Korineum Golf Resort which is one of the best in the Mediterranean.

This project can offer you a variety of luxurious sea view apartments in Esentepe, Northern Cyprus, from amazing garden apartments and loft penthouses to spacious villas. This complex will include 105 units. 8 A blocks combining one-bedroom garden apartments on the ground floor and two-bedroom loft penthouses on the first floor with private roof terraces. 20B blocks which combine garden studio apartments on the ground floor and studio penthouses on the first floor with private roof terraces. In addition, there will be 16 C blocks, which are three-bedroom villas with private roof terraces and direct access to the swimming pool.

What makes this project unique is that it is designed in a way that you feel yourself in actual jungles. You can enjoy the huge special designed pools which will cover all over the complex’s territory and give you the feeling of an oasis. The complex's phenomenal location gives a unique living atmosphere. With just a few steps, you can enjoy the endless water of the Mediterranean Sea. The calming sight of the mountains will relieve your stress and increase your mental health. The modernity and smartness of the design will blow your mind. You will experience a unique connection to nature through the beautiful gardens within the complex. This project is simply a combination of modernity and nature.

COMPLETION DATE: END OF 2025

  • Studio Penthouses with a gross area of 35 m2, terraces area of 8 m2 and roof terrace area of 35 m2.Starting price is 85.000 GBP.

  • 3 Bedroom Villas gross area of 125 m2, terraces area of 75 m2 and roof terrace area of 125 m2.Starting price is 650.000 GBP.

  • Airport: 50 km / 75 km
  • Beach: 100 m
  • Korineum Golf Club: 10 km

  • High capital appreciation

description:
Luxurious properties with uninterrupted sea and mountain views in Tatlisu, North Cyprus

New premium class project which is situated in the middle of the sea and mountains, situated in Tatlisu region in North Cyprus, 40 km East of Kyrenia located between the Beşparmak Mountains and the Mediterranean coast. description:

title: Outstanding new project with seafront properties in Lapta, North Cyprus
description:
Outstanding new project with seafront properties in Lapta, North Cyprus

From the rocky green mountains and through the valley down to the clean blue sea lies the spirit of this project in North Cyprus. This project is being built at the seafront just as you enter the Lapta strip, to the west of Kyrenia. With this brand-new manner of living, you'll discover peace and calmness at each nook and curve. You can stroll via the lovely scented gardens right all the way down to the sea and experience the liberty of this new concept. It is a development destination without comparison, withinside the heart of a current tourism hotspot only 10 mins away from Kyrenia. Within a totally quick stroll you can experience the hotels, shops, restaurants, bars and crystal-clean seashore which are all located close to this project.

At Irina you could pick from 6 block types of properties, from 1 to a few bedrooms. There are 10 A units which are 3-bedroom villas that have a private swimming pool. The 40 B units are 2-bedroom apartment flats located either on the ground floor or on the first floor. The 20 D units are pool villas which have 2-bedrooms as well as a private pool dedicated to the property. Also, there are 28 J units, where half are garden apartments, and the other half are penthouses. The 12 E units are 1-bedroom penthouse apartments, and all the blocks have their own terrace space. Seafront luxury homes in Lapta, Northern Cyprus.

COMPLETION DATE: March 2025

 

  • 1+1 penthouse apartment: 67 m2 + terrace area 35 m2
  • Price is € 189.000

  • 2+1 garden and first floor apartment: 71-82 m2 + terrace area 10-13 m2
  • Price is € 199.000 and € 225.000

  • 2+1 penthouse apartment: 71 m2 + terrace area 50 m2

  • 2+1 pool villa: 105 m2 + terrace area 65 m2
